text: Isobel Hannen (born 17 December 1962 as Isobel Torrance Jr.) is a Scottish curler and curling coach. She is a . She competed at the 1992 Winter Olympics when curling was a demonstration sport. ==Personal life== Her mother Isobel Torrance is a former competitive curler, and two-time Scottish women's champion.
